events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position and our team will begin reviewing it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department as a developer role, aligning with your background and skills.
A recruiter experienced in software engineering roles has been assigned to your application and will soon reach out to guide you.
Your initial screening interview was completed successfully; the recruiter was impressed with your experience and technical knowledge.
You responded promptly and positively to the screening feedback, expressing enthusiasm for the next stages of the software engineer hiring process.
The technical interview for the software engineering position has been scheduled for May 7th, 10 AM UTC, and you have been sent the calendar invite.
